scripts.dev: yarn db:ensure && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && yarn dev" "cd apps/web && yarn dev"
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && yarn build" "cd apps/web && yarn build"
scripts.start: yarn db:ensure && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && yarn start" "cd apps/web && yarn preview"
scripts.typecheck: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "API,WEB" "cd apps/api && yarn tsc --noEmit" "cd apps/web && yarn tsc --noEmit"
